features: Keep your "cookies" fresh and stay sweet with this all-natural feminine wash
Made with organic oils and other all-natural ingredients
Easy to use! Just pump it out, rub it on & wash it off!
body.description: Cookie Wash is a gentle, foaming cleanser designed to moisturize and re-freshen the most intimate and sensitive parts of your body. Directions: For external use only. Press foam pump to dispense wash. Apply wash on target area and rub thoroughly. Rinse off with water and pat dry. May be used daily. Discontinue use if any irritation occurs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to Me
reviews.reviewText: The first time I bought this is back in 2018 and I really did like it. Yes it did burn to me and I had to rinse really well but after about 2-3 days it wasn’t irritating anymore. I like it because i stay fresh and it comes unscented. The only thing that has deferred me is the price but for how long it last (about 3 months for me) I can live with it. This soap lathers really well and comes out as a foam. I use half a pump per wash and usually wash up about 3 times before getting out the shower. I’ve found that a full pump is almost too soapy/bubbly and wasteful since I only use it on my lady bits 🤷🏽‍♀️ I used summers eve, unscented before this and liked it but I definitely prefer this and wouldn’t go back. I don’t know what it is that causes the burning the first 2-3 days because I’ve never experienced that but as long as I rinsed well it would stop within mins of me getting out of the shower. It never left any rashes or redness or anything like that. And again I have no irritation at all now. I would try it. I didn’t realize I have been using this since 2018 until I came to buy another bottle and decided to leave a review, so this is definitely a staple for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic in a bottle
reviews.reviewText: This brand was actually recommended to me by a close friend who has used these products for years. I was actually surprised to see that this was the only product on Amazon. I placed an order on the product site and received this product 1st. This is no normal cleanse. It’s general, moisturizing, hydrating all in one. I promise once you use this brand of products you will not use anything else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don’t get lavender it’s not lavender scent
reviews.reviewText: It works but don’t like the smell it didn’t smell like lavender. It does give me a dry feeling which I like. Kinda like wearing deodorant but In a wash formUpdate just purchased my second bottle I still have some fem fresh and honey pot let don’t care for them like this one. I don’t line honey pot at all honestly and fem fresh smells good and makes ur skin soft but that’s it nor long lasting at all! I actually found this product looking for fem fresh. I can’t find the original scent

reviews.reviewText: Great to use for your ph balance, it keeps it in check. Can go All day without showering. If used properly. Stay fresh all day. And cleanse it great. Highly recommend to only use this soap for your private area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The product works very well! I love how clean I feel after using this. It did tingle a bit when I used it the first time but not at all after that. I have been using the product for a week and I feel squeaky clean.
